# [Interview #588: Goodreads ToM Fantasy Book Club Q&A with Brandon Sanderson, Entry #12](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=588#12)

#### Brianna

Here's my question: who is throwing the dice that Mat hears in his head?

#### Brandon Sanderson

RAFO.
